Posts.EditableText:
Can anyone tell me how to convert a Quest game to JavaScript? 
Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Can anyone tell me how to convert a Quest game to JavaScript?
Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: There's code for it on Git-Hub. You'd just have to copy the whole thing into JavaScript.
Posts.HTML: There's code for it on Git-Hub. You'd just have to copy the whole thing into JavaScript.

Posts.EditableText: There's a project on Github which is supposed to convert Quest to JS; but as far as I'm aware it was last updated when Quest 5.7 was current, and didn't support all the built-in functions. So it'll work with some games, more likely if you use only the most basic functions.
Posts.HTML: There's a project on Github which is supposed to convert Quest to JS; but as far as I'm aware it was last updated when Quest 5.7 was current, and didn't support all the built-in functions. So it'll work with some games, more likely if you use only the most basic functions.
